CustomField.description: Contribution calculates margin on sale, (As UnitPrice - Unit_Cost__c)
CustomField.formula: IF($Setup.crms11__FlexPricer_Settings__c.crms11__Disable_Contribution_Calculation__c, IF( ISNULL(crms11__Unit_Cost__c), NULL , TotalPrice - ( Quantity * crms11__Unit_Cost__c ) ), NULL)
CustomField.label: Contribution
